```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
x <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Financial-Times/police-misconduct-complaints-analysis/main/output/philly_clean.csv")
```


```{r}
summary(x)
```

```{r}
x %>%
  select(officer_id) %>%
  group_by(officer_id) %>%
  summarise(total = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(total))
  
      
```
